wikipedia_page.main: John Hollingworth (born 21 August 1981) is an English actor from Keighley, Bradford, West Yorkshire.

response: Modesty Blaise  was originally broadcast from 16 to 20 June 2014, featuring Neil Maskell as Willie and Alun Armstrong as Tarrant, with Ewan Bailey (Gabriel), Alex Fearns (McWhirter), Matthew Gravelle, John Hollingworth and Hannah Pakeman.
He is featured as a character in the first three series of the Netflix drama The Crown, portrayed by Joseph Kloska in the first two series and John Hollingworth in the third series.

An Intervention is a 2014 play by the British playwright Mike Bartlett. It premiered at the Watford Palace Theatre (in a co-production with Paines Plough) in April, 2014, was directed by James Grieve and featured Rachael Stirling and John Hollingworth.
* John Hollingworth as Dr. John Maling, district GP

In the Earth (stylized as IN THE EⱯRTH) is a 2021 horror film written and directed by Ben Wheatley. An American-British co-production, the film stars Joel Fry, Reece Shearsmith, Hayley Squires, Ellora Torchia, John Hollingworth and Mark Monero.
|| Director: Ben Wheatley  Cast: Joel Fry, Reece Shearsmith, Hayley Squires, Ellora Torchia, John Hollingworth, Mark Monero
